statements: DELETE FROM audits WHERE user_id = 100 AND access_pattern = 'read';
DELETE FROM audits WHERE audit_id = 5 AND user_id = 10;
DELETE FROM audits WHERE user_id = 15 AND script_name = 'example_script';
DELETE FROM auditing_security_policies WHERE PolicyName = 'Policy XYZ'
DELETE FROM auditing_security_policies WHERE ID = 1 AND PolicyName = 'Policy 1';
DELETE FROM audit_logs WHERE UserID = 100 AND ActionTaken = 'Delete' AND PolicyID IN (SELECT ID FROM auditing_security_policies WHERE PolicyName = 'Policy 3');
DELETE FROM access_patterns WHERE pattern_id IN (1, 2);
